title: Savoury rhubarb and ginger jam
ingredients: ['500g rhubarb, sliced', '1 to 2 teaspoons freshly grated root ginger, to taste', '1 cinnamon stick', '3 tablespoons dried thyme', '2 teaspoons cracked black peppercorns', '1 to 2 shallots, minced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '120g light brown soft sugar']
